title: How to Make Quick and Easy Peanut Butter Cookies

steps.headline: Cream together 1 egg and 1/2 cup sugar until slightly frothy.
Stir in 1/2 cup of peanut butter to creamed mixture and mix until smooth.
Add the flour as needed to thicken the batter, if necessary.
Drop by rounded spoonfuls about two inches apart onto a non-stick cookie sheet and mash with fork in a checked pattern.
Bake for 8-12 minutes until the cookies are slightly brown on the edges.
Let cookies cool for several minutes before removing them from the cookie sheet.

text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Cream together 1 egg and 1/2 cup sugar until slightly frothy.  Stir in 1/2 cup of peanut butter to creamed mixture and mix until smooth.  Add 1 teaspoon of vanilla.  Add the flour as needed to thicken the batter, if necessary.  Drop by rounded spoonfuls about two inches apart onto a non-stick cookie sheet and mash with fork in a checked pattern. Sprinkle them evenly with sugar. Bake for 8-12 minutes until the cookies are slightly brown on the edges.  Let cookies cool for several minutes before removing them from the cookie sheet.  Enjoy your cookies!
